content.question: Two blocks are held in place on a horizontal surface, with a compressed spring between them. The mass of the left block is twice the mass of the right block, and there is negligible friction between the blocks and the surface. The blocks are simultaneously released. The spring expands, pushing the blocks apart, and then falls to the surface. The right block has speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>. What is the speed of the left block?
